name: Quarantine: The Game
description:
Try to keep people at home by strategically enacting and revoking public health and safety laws.

  • Use the 'Laws' button to enact laws
  • Virus spreads by proximity when an infected citizen coughs
  • Mask laws reduce transmission range but make people unhappy
  • Shops let citizens buy toilet paper which increases happiness
  • Parks quickly increase happiness when citizens visit
  • When happiness gets too low, people will start protesting
  • Immunity is a measurement of how close a citizen is to recovering

Made in 48 hours for GMTK2020
